PARAGRAPH.STRING: , officially the Republic of Panama (Spanish: República de Panamá, IPA [IPA: [re'puβlika ðe pana'ma]]), is the southernmost and most developed country of Central America. A transcontinental country,
isthmus constitutes the southernmost part of a natural land bridge between the continents of North America and South America.
borders Costa Rica to the northwest, Colombia to the east, the Atlantic Ocean to the north and the Pacific Ocean to the south.
